TopicTitle: Special role for former KSP Team members?

Articles.Content:
I was thinking about it when I looked at this. So I checked few other accounts of people who have been working on KSP (namely, HarvesteR, of course) and I noticed that, except a special rank under their forum name, they're just "members".

So, my idea is, create a special, orange (Jeb's spacesuit orange, not current KSP Team yellowish orange) Veteran role to honor everyone who was involved in creation of this epic game. It would do nothing except making these people more noticeable. Which is of course important.

How about that?

11 hours ago, The Aziz said:

I was thinking about it when I looked at this. So I checked few other accounts of people who have been working on KSP (namely, HarvesteR, of course) and I noticed that, except a special rank under their forum name, they're just "members".

So, my idea is, create a special, orange (Jeb's spacesuit orange, not current KSP Team yellowish orange) Veteran role to honor everyone who was involved in creation of this epic game. It would do nothing except making these people more noticeable. Which is of course important.

How about that?

i like it!
I think this is a fantastic suggestion. I would like to see something like this to be implemented.

This is a great idea. 

I’m not sure if there are hard feelings between  Squad and the former developers who left in 2016 over working condition and whether that might get in the way.
I support this! KSP was such a great game these guys deserve legendary status.
